'''Sirafi''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Sumeru City]], [[Sumeru]].

Following a certain dialogue branch for the first time gives the player four [[Harra Fruit]].

==Thoughts==
{{All Schemes to Know Explanation|name=Sirafi}}
:{{A|VO Sirafi All Schemes to Know 01.ogg}} '''Sirafi:''' (With me providing cover here, the boss' secret trade route should be safe.)

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Sirafi:''' Don't take my goods for the simple stuff. They're all from the renowned "[[Palace of Alcazarzaray]]."
:{{DIcon}} About the Palace of Alcazarzaray...
::'''Sirafi:''' Even if you've never heard of that name, you should know the enormous palace in northern Sumeru, right?
::'''Sirafi:''' That's right, that's the Palace of Alcazarzaray. I work for the owner.
::'''Sirafi:''' Any product she touched carries a higher price, even if it couldn't be more ordinary!
::{{DIcon|Reward}} That good, huh?
:::'''Sirafi:''' You don't believe me? Well, you should check the quality of my products before you make any judgment.
:::'''Sirafi:''' You can have them. The Palace of Alcazarzaray won't have a problem with it.
::;(Obtain {{Item|Harra Fruit|x=4}})
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Sirafi:''' Guaranteed genuine article!
{{Dialogue End}}
